body.name: Men's Casual Leather Jeans Belts Classic Work Business Dress Belt with Prong Buckle for Men
features: HIGH QUALITY BELT: This belt crafted from quality leather, with Nickle free single prong buckle; highly constructed and durable, gives you a nice and clean look looks.
SIZING: Belts strap width1 1/4‘’. For best fit, please refer our size chart, order one size larger than your waist/pants size. For example if your waist size is 32 inch, select size 34 (waist 32).

VERSATILE: It is an ideal men accessory, to wear as an everyday leather belt; never go out of style with the classic yet stylish design of this belt, high quality material advancing your taste in fashion, the belt goes great with suit pants, jeans or formal wear.
PACKAGE: Our leather dress belt packed in a gift box. It is great as a present for your friends, family and lover in any special days or anniversary.
EXCELLENT SERVICE: If you are unhappy with our belt or service, please contact us. Our customer service staff will solve it within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Premium Quality and Timeless Style - The Perfect Companion for Any Outfit!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)I recently purchased the XOUXOU Men's Casual Leather Jeans Belt, and I am thrilled with the experience this belt has provided me. The union of comfort, style, and quality craftsmanship sets this belt apart. Here’s my comprehensive review:Material and Craftsmanship (5/5):The leather material used in the XOUXOU Men’s Casual Belt is of exceptional quality, providing a soft, comfortable feel while exuding a premium, elegant appearance. The meticulous craftsmanship is evident, ensuring the belt is not just an accessory but an addition that enhances the overall look.Design (5/5):The classic design of this belt is undoubtedly one of its most appealing features. It seamlessly integrates with both casual and business attire, offering versatility and adding a polished touch to any ensemble. The prong buckle adds to the sophistication and ensures a secure and customizable fit.Durability (4/5):After using this belt daily in various settings – from business meetings to casual outings – it has shown impressive durability. The leather maintains its rich color and texture, and the buckle holds up with consistent use, showing no signs of wear and tear.Comfort and Fit (5/5):The belt provides an optimal fit and ample comfort. It adjusts easily, allowing for a tailored fit that doesn’t constrain, ensuring comfort throughout the day. The ample hole placements accommodate varying needs, making it suitable for a wide range of waist sizes.Value for Money (5/5):Given the superior quality, design versatility, and robust build, the XOUXOU Men’s Casual Leather Belt offers outstanding value for money. It’s an investment in style, comfort, and durability that will undoubtedly stand the test of time.Conclusion:In summation, the XOUXOU Men's Casual Leather Jeans Belt emerges as an exemplary choice for those seeking a blend of style, quality, and functionality. It stands as a testament to excellent craftsmanship, attention to detail, and a keen understanding of fashion trends and practicality. Whether for business attire or casual wear, this belt proves to be an indispensable accessory that elevates every outfit while ensuring comfort and durability. It’s a purchase you won’t regret and a stylish companion you’ll be reaching for time and again. Highly recommended for the modern, discerning man!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Reasonably priced!!
reviews.reviewText: Genuine leather crafted to perfection! Belt seems very durable, and looks stylish! Much better than the reversible models! Seems as if it will last a long time, and I will look great using it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I cannot rate "durability" after only 6 days. Seems fine.
reviews.reviewText: I cannot rate "durability" after only 6 days. Seems fine. Ask me to review this a year from today. The last belt I bought and reviewed here on Amazon was bought and delivered in February, 2023 and started to crack and show signs of imminent failure in November, 2023. This is NOT the same brand as that last one. Durability should be 4-5 or more years; NOT 9 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality anf Feel well done
reviews.reviewText: This looks and feels deluxe. The product information included the proper sizing to order, which most dont. I'm glad I bought this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it is supposed to do - hold my pants up.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased a size 56 belt (54 inch waste) in black. Belt is approximately 63.5 inches long overall. As shown in the photos, the buckle holes begin about 53.5 inches from the buckle end and continue every inch thereafter ending at 59.5 inches (7 total holes). If I had to do it again I would have purchased one size smaller as on my 54 waste I am using the last hole rather than the more ideal situation of being in the middle of the selection. If I lose any weight (hope springs eternal) I have no place to go and would have to add a hole. This would then make the "tail" of the belt unusually long. The belt itself is not adjustable as the buckle is sewn in.Overall, though, I am pleased with the purchase. As a corpulent gent, finding reasonably priced dress belts that fit can be a challenge. Nice, conservative styling for both buckle and belt. Have only worn it twice so impossible to evaluate durability/longevity but upon initial inspection the stitching appears solid and the finish on the leather looks to be flexible enough to avoid wrinkling/cracking prematurely.I wear a dress belt for work 5 days per week. I will update this review in the future to include my experience with its durability over time. For now, based upon fit and initial appearance, it gets a five star rating from me. Represents a good value in a wide selection of sizes and colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Belt
reviews.reviewText: Just picked up this belt and it's solid. Feels durable and fits just right, snug but not tight. It's comfortable to wear all day, doesn’t irritate, and looks rugged. Great for daily use. Highly recommend it for someone who need a reliable, comfortable belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Bad At All
reviews.reviewText: The look is clean and plain which is what I wanted. It's a tad bit wider than I wanted, but it's made well and doesn't look cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size is misleading
reviews.reviewText: Although the belt was crafted fine, the length was not as expected. The whole belt was 9.25 inches longer than expected and the hole for the smallest waist size was 1.5 inches bigger than the waist size advertised. I would have expected the advertised waist size to correspond to the middle hole in the belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I previously was not happy about this order as it took forever to arrive. However, not the fault of the seller as the courier was new and alas not sure of how to do deliveries. This was the second belt I ordered as the first one I got was excellent was well.
